repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of Taittirīya āraṇyaka which begins with the first prapāṭhaka but the end is not clear. At the end colophon mentions Kāṭhaka pustaka. The colophon given in the VOHD II.7 p-856 entry 2278 is different than the one found in the origanl manuscript. Saṃvatsara year is not mentioned so the date is incomplete.

msItem.title: Taittirīya āraṇyaka
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 bhadraṃ karṇebhiśśruṇuyāmadevāḥ . bhadram(gap of almost 22 syllables due to broken folio.)
1v 2vahitaṃ yadāyuḥ . svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ puṣā viśvavedāḥ . svasti na tārkṣyo a[riṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛ] (not completely legible due to damaged folio.) (gap of 1 syllable due to broken folio.)
1v 3 spatirdadhātu . āpamā[pā]mapaḥ sarvāḥ asmādasmāditomutaḥ uta agnirvāyuścasūryaśca sahasaṃñcaskararddhiy[ā]
msItem.explicit:
146r 5 ndevebhyastapasā devebhyo brahma vai caturhotārau yacāmutraṃ sarvāndīpaṃ sarvāndevā cāt prācīnava caturvyāpa ?
146r 6 (gap of 1 letter due to broken folio.) vā etāhiraṇyandadāti sarvāndiśastapa āsīt ṣaṭpañcāśat . (4 syllable illegible.) .
msItem.finalRubric: hariḥ oṃ .. śubhamastu .. śrīgurubhyo namaḥ . 146r 7 (gap of 1 -2 syllables due to damaged folio.) daṃ kāṭhakapustakaṃ kauṇḍanyakulotbhavena sūryanārāyaṇena likhitaṃ .. karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .

support.p: Thick wooden guard cover with some scratch marks on the upper part.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio and 146 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin on the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of Preservation inspite of fragile state of the palm leaves.

handNote.desc: Rounded characters, nice and clean but some pplaces are difficult to read.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu in the left margin on 1v.

origin.origDate: The scribe name is a Sūryanārāyaṇa kauṇḍanya and the manuscript was completed somewhere between February and March of unmentioned year.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya Āraṇyaka of the Black Yajurveda with the commentary of Sāyaṇācārya edited by Rājendralāla Mitra Calcutta Printed by C B Lewis, at the Baptis Mission Press 1872 A collection of Orienatal works published under the Sperintendence of the Asiatic Society of Bengal New Series 60, 74, 88, 97, 130, 144, 159, 169,203, 226 and 263.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are given to separate words, square bracket used to show inferred words.
